resources.string: By creating the wallet, you need to write down your seed recovery phrase and store it securely so that your wallet can be recovered in the case your device was lost for stolen
Do not let anyone see your seed phrase.
Never type your seed phrase into password managers or elsewhere.
Make at least 2 copies of the phrase in caseof emergency.

Your seed phrase is the access key to all the funds in your wallet. Print or write down the phrase to keep it in a safe or in a locked vault.Without the phrase you will not be able to recover your money.
Please write the seed phrase down. Do not screenshot it and save it in your photo gallery. It makes the phrase prone to cyber attacks and, less secure.
To ensure the seed phrase is written down correctly. please fill in the specific words below.
Match the words to their due sequences
The words are inconsistent with the seed phrase.please try again
Your current seed will become obsolete and the new seed will be generated
If you return to seed phrase,it would be changed and your local password won\'t be saved
Create password to access your wallet
You are highly recommended to set a strong password, preferably with uppercase and lowercase letters and numbers.
The recovered wallet will cover the original wallet,please be cautious
Failed to create wallet, please check the information you filled out Is the seed phrase correct
Restoring wallet…Please do not close wallet
This is a 24 word phrase you were given when you created your previous wallet.
